# ConfigureConnectorStatsPublishingRequest

Configures how one or more connectors of an organisation publish statistics 

## Properties
Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**org_id** | **str** | Unique identifier | 
**connector_ids** | **[str]** | The list of connectors to configure | 
**stats_publishing_config** | [**StatsPublishingConfig**](StatsPublishingConfig.md) |  | 
**any string name** | **bool, date, datetime, dict, float, int, list, str, none_type** | any string name can be used but the value must be the correct type | [optional]
